exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="EndRankItemSkin" width="198" height="253" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="160d9991c56" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="bg" source="rankchose_png" top="0" right="0" left="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label id="rank" text="30" x="3" y="19" size="30" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0xDDDDDE" italic="true" bold="true" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" width="193"/>
	<e:Label id="nameText" text="srwe巨盾footMan21212" x="1" y="170" size="20" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0xDDDDDE" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="195" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" multiline="false"/>
	<e:Image id="userPic" width="80" height="80" x="59" y="65" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="score" width="383" height="62" x="3" y="212" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" font="ziti_fnt" text="40" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" letterSpacing="3" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameEndSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1607c5a4d5e"/>
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="-5.5" verticalCenter="26">
		<e:Label text="本次得分" x="257.17" y="-1.65" textColor="0xddddde" size="36" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
		<e:Image id="restartBtn" source="againBtn_png" x="193" y="831.1"/>
		<e:Image source="rankbody_png" x="2" y="300.62"/>
		<e:Label text="排行榜" x="72" y="366.62" size="24" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0xDDDDDE"/>
		<e:Image source="titlepng_png" x="56.5" y="0"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="myscore" width="245.33" height="64.04" y="117.46" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" text="0" font="ziti_fnt" rotation="359.52" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="3.5" textAlign="center" letterSpacing="6"/>
		<e:Label id="topScore" text="历史最高分：0" size="30" fontFamily="SimHei" x="217" y="760.77"/>
		<e:Group id="subGroup" width="590" height="262" x="30" y="400" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:Label id="notIngameText" text="只有在App中登陆，才能获得排名和奖励哦，快去下载App然后登陆吧！" x="40" y="42" size="36" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0xDDDDDE" anchorOffsetY="0" height="172" anchorOffsetX="0" width="510" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="allRank" text="查看全部排行>" x="438" y="356.62" size="24" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0xDDDDDE"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="closeBtn_png" right="36" top="84"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameInfoSkin" width="640" height="680" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="160a162cf95"/>
	<e:Image source="ranktitle_png" x="-13" y="-20"/>
	<e:Label id="titleText" text="游戏说明" x="199" y="107" size="60" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true"/>
	<e:Image id="goBackBtn" source="backGame_png" y="522" x="185"/>
	<e:Label id="desc" text="点击屏幕，红色的时钟会发射子弹射击其他时钟，被击中的时钟会代替红色时钟，并会增加分数，注意红色时钟的方向哦！" size="36" anchorOffsetY="0" height="330" anchorOffsetX="0" width="466" bold="true" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0x46b7e6" x="89" y="180" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" lineSpacing="20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameStartSkinSkin" minWidth="360" minHeight="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:Group id="mainGroup" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0">
		<e:Image source="bgGo_jpg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="title_png" anchorOffsetX="2" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0.5" top="129"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RankListItemSkin" width="660" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="160a06e27c6" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="660" height="120" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0x152139" fillAlpha="0.6"/>
	<e:Rect width="86" height="86" x="94" y="18" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" ellipseWidth="0" ellipseHeight="0" fillColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label id="order" x="20.01" y="43.32" size="36" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textAlign="left" text=""/>
	<e:Label x="200.31" y="41.4" size="36" fontFamily="SimHei" text="{data.userName}"/>
	<e:Label x="377.03" y="25.32" size="72" fontFamily="SimHei" textAlign="right" anchorOffsetX="0" width="253.33" text="{data.userScore}"/>
	<e:Image id="userPic" width="86" height="86" x="94" y="18"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RankPanelSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="160a035ebee" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="GameBG_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>
    <e:Scroller id="scroller" height="80%" width="670" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" top="164" left="42" right="8">
		<e:List id="mylist" anchorOffsetY="0" height="1085" x="89" y="-4" anchorOffsetX="0" width="680" locked="true">
			<e:layout> 
				<e:VerticalLayout/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:List>

		<e:Skin>
			<e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" width="8" minHeight="100%" height="100%" right="0">
            <e:Skin>
					<e:Image id="thumb" width="0" source="" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:VScrollBar>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image source="titleKuang_png" x="192.05" y="48.16"/>
	<e:Button id="nationBtn" name = "nationBtn" label="" x="377.12" y="77.16">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="nationRnak_png" source.down="nation_2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="localBtn" name = "localBtn" label="" x="247.12" y="75.16" enabled="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="local_2_png" source.down="localRank_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="backBtn" source="rankBack_png" left="62" top="64"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RewardsSkinSkin" width="640" height="680" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="161021bf1f7"/>
	<e:Group width="200" height="200" x="-6" y="-48">
		<e:Image source="ranktitle_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="-8" y="28"/>
		<e:Scroller width="464.67" height="408.94" x="91.03" y="151.81" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:Group width="486.67" height="435.42" x="97" y="130" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:Label id="desc" text="    周榜第一名，可获得价值五百元的新年大礼包一份，奖品由浏阳广播电视台提供。
				周榜第二名，可获得价值三百元的新年礼包一份，奖品由千城智联（上海）网络科技有限公司提供。 周榜第三名，可获得价值一百元的新年奖券一份，奖品由浏阳食品公司提供。
				通关用户将有机会获得最高一千元现金红包奖励。
				周榜奖励会在每周日的20:00进行统计，获奖用户可凭借帐号排名，前往浏阳广播电视台进行兑换。
				本活动排名以“掌上浏阳”客户端排位为准。
				本次活动最终解释权归浏阳广播电视台所有。" size="36" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" bold="true" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0x46b7e6" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" lineSpacing="20" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="0" bottom="-812.06" y="246" right="4.670000000000016" left="0" width="500" height="600"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>

			<e:Skin>
			<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source=""/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Button id="okBtn" label="知道了" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="57.64" horizontalCenter="226.5" bottom="-455">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnskin_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UninAppNoticSkin" width="640" height="680" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="16101ffe6d3"/>
	<e:Group width="200" height="200" x="-6" y="-48">
		<e:Image source="ranktitle_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="28" left="-8" right="-461" bottom="-678"/>
		<e:Scroller width="464.67" height="408.94" x="91.03" y="151.81" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<e:Group width="486.67" height="435.42" x="97" y="130" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:Label id="desc" text="非官方APP目前仅支持游戏体验，所得分数不计入排行。 下载并登录官方APP参加趣味游戏，可参与好友排行，还有丰厚奖励等你拿哦！" size="36" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" bold="true" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0x46b7e6" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" lineSpacing="20" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="0" bottom="17.939999999999998" y="246" right="4.670000000000016" left="0" width="500" height="600"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>

			<e:Skin>
			<e:Image id="thumb" width="8" source=""/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Button id="gameBtn" label="立即试玩" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="57.64" left="90" bottom="-455">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnskin_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="linkBtn" label="立即下载" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="191.18" anchorOffsetY="0" height="57.64" right="-363" bottom="-455">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnskin_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		
		
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="bloodProcessSkin" width="92" height="24" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1611c9c8d4b" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="bloodBarBg_png" x="0" scale9Grid="15,8,56,7" width="100%" height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" source="bloodBar_png" x="0" y="0" scale9Grid="19,9,51,5" width="100%" height="100%"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="1/2" size="16" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="SimHei" verticalCenter="1"/>

	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="startButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="btnStart" includeIn="disabled" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="1"/>
</e:Skin>
